name: .LWP File Extension
summary: Learn about .LWP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Word processing document created by Lotus Word Pro, a business-oriented word processor included with the Lotus Smart Suite; used to create reports, proposals, and other kinds of documents.

content: LWP files can be opened with the free KeyView for Lotus application, which was developed by Verity.
NOTE: Lotus is a subsidiary of IBM.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
